result.reason: Adding window controls (min/max/close) to full screen mode improves usability, aligning with common full-screen behaviors in other applications (e.g., browsers, RDP).
result.approach: Create a floating or auto-hiding panel/toolbar containing minimize, maximize/restore, and close buttons. Show this panel when the mouse hovers near the top of the screen while in full screen mode (handled in FullscreenHandler). Connect the button events to frmMain's window state and close methods.
